title: Describe your last game with a movie title!

replies.body:
Predator

Team of 5 squishies, against 5 fighters. The jungle was not kind.
The Little Mermaid.

{{champion:267}} 
Someone's been carrying with Nami. :D
YUS! :D

I played Wukong and we won, so....

Rise of the Planet of the Apes?
Smurfs... and like the movie it sucked.

for some reason
i could not stop laughing at this..LoL{{champion:115}}
Dumb and dumber

**Open Season.**

...we lost.
Lone Survivor
Crouching Caitlyn Hidden Yordle
Always Outnumbered. We won 4v5. :D

2012

The teamfights were devastating.

Harry Potter and the Deathly Hollows... i was playing veigar and my team was losing but i ended up 24/3/7 won the game, carried hard, one shot almost everyone with 1500 AP and DFG x) EXPELIOMUS or whatever :P
I believe Avada Kedavra {{item:3137}}  would be more appropriate here :D
totally XD veigar ult reminds me of every epic harrypotter spell x)

*The Bourne Identity.*

Master Yi/Vi top (pre-game confusion), no ADC. Our jungler was going AP Xin Zhao. I was Karma support. Yi and Vi have a go, Vi goes support. We were all confused. How had this happened? WHY DIDN'T WE NOTICE BEFORE THE GAME STARTED? WHAT THE HELL AM I GOING TO DO WITH MY SPELLTHIEF'S EDGE AS A KARMA AP CARRY? WHO WAS BEHIND THIS CONSPIRACY TO MAKE US LOSE?

We made mistakes. A poorly executed tower dive on our part gave the enemy Jinx a double-kill. All hope seemed lost. We spent the whole game running. Our jungle was far from safe. After taking bot turret, I went mid, where me and Kassadin played the kiting game against... well, basically the whole team. It was only a matter of time.

And then our Master Yi (they had one too) got a quadra kill... and we won.

Edge of tommorow.

Blitz hooks the enemy. get kills. repeat.

One of the best games i've had on an adc
Alien vs predator {{champion:121}}  vs {{champion:107}}
I bet it was more like "Hot Fuzz"
And which one is Simon Pegg, which one is Nick Frost? I can see Vi being Nick and Cait Simon, but it would make for some pretty awkward scenarios.
There Will be Blood
Skyfall... it was very sad.
Please tell me you were playing Lucian
Nasus, actually. The old dog had to put down.

Lassie?

EDIT: Nassie?
Why not Old Yeller, Where the Red Fern Grows, or Cujo?

It was the fall of a great man.

I mean, he was a dog man. Or maybe he was just a dog. But he was still Nasus!
Was I the only one to immediately think {{champion:80}} ?
No. I was worried someone would think that, though.
Dawn of the Dead
{{champion:89}} ?
Nah, I played AD Sion....and everyone ran for their lives and took pot shots at me. Anyone who was fast enough fed the Zombie.
2 Girls 1 cup - Liss vs. Lux, both had athenes.
That would be 2 cups though...{{item:3174}} {{item:3174}}
I Am Legend lol

The Lion King 1 an a half

They dint know the struggles against a {{champion:80}}  as a {{champion:75}}

Arachnophobia...
I was {{champion:60}} and they "/ff"ed before 30 mins
Orgazmo

A Good Day to Die Hard

Was playing Caitlyn... god I hate ADC.

Yogi Bear.
 An {{champion:77}} , didn't kill me at EVERY situation. I was {{champion:28}} .

The Silence of the Lambs.

._.

> I'll start.... 
> 
> Mission Impossible

Shotgun Willy

Groundhog Day

(Teemo was the only reason they won ;A; )

The Curse of the Werewolf (1961). 3 teammates including myself disconnected from the game leaving Warwick jungle and Morgana support alone, Warwick carried the game with 2 pentakills and we ended up winning.{{champion:19}} {{champion:19}}
A self-made failure
Silence of the lambs...
